comments.author: L oL

comments.text:
+tG Gnar At least TSM is actually consistent. What is it? 9-0 or 10-0 now 
against teams lower in the standings? so they aren't throwing to EG, Curse, 
and Complexity like every other team?


I like CLG, DIG, and C9 as teams, but it's ridiculous to give no credit to 
TSM and make every excuse possible for why they're winning. This seems to 
be what everyone does (Thorin, Montecristo, and I'm a fan of both those 
people) and that's what everyone did back in late Season 1 and Season 2 as 
well. CLG and DIG used to be like "Oh yeah, we'll beat them real soon, TSM 
doesn't do anything special, we just play badly." after being dominated for 
a full year.

captions.text: The Oddone!  The Oddone, is that you?
Hey, can you hear us? Or are you "the dead one"?
What the hell are you talking about?  The dead one?
Im' the General.  I never die!
Ok, go check it out, I'll stay here.
Whatever, the General! We'er just is happy to see that you're alive right now.
You have no idea how important you are to us...now.
What are you talking about?
There's a virus outbreak out there. Many people were infected.
It's like a jungle out there.
Really?  Like a jungle?
Yeah! But, I think we have a way to fix all this.  Because you are patient zero
and we have to carry you back to HyperX labs right now!
(muffled voice heard screaming)
Magnus!  Here, hold this, I'll be right back.
Only shoot it though, if you have to.
I'm a big fan!  Rembember me?  We turned Xpecial into a girl with a lazer that one time, eh?
Come on!
Oh, hey man.  How did you get back up there?
I don't know, it happened so fast!  He came out of nowhere!
Come on, I could use a little support!
Ok, hold on one second.

What the hell is this stuff?  Ahh!
0:01:56.289,1193:02:47.295
what are you doing appalled not gonna
stop helped broker pocket money not good
What are you doing? A Poro is not going to stop him!
Ok...uh...
Can you find any knives in there?
No, these guys don't cook!  What did you expect?
How about you use yourself as bait and I'll get my boken?
Carl!

-Oh!
-Wait a minute, what did you just throw?

-HyperX Memory sticks.
-Well I think it worked!  Aim for his head!

-Ah!
-Oh!

-Son of a bitch!
-My bad, man.

-Bawh-aw!
-Damn it!  Oh...

-Why?
-I'm sorry, man!  Oh...

-That's my other leg!  Are you serious?  I'll never walk again!
-We'er just your sponsors!
Easy there, big fella!  Ok...
Ok, wait, wait, wait!
We'er just the sponsors, HyperX!
The dead shouldn't be walking.
No, not you too, Turtle.  We may not be fighting side by side anymore, but we'er still a team.

-GG.
-(gunshot)

-GG.
-(gasp)
Oh, phew!  Thank God it was just a dream... Ha ha ha!

-knock knock
-Hey Turtle!
Practice has been cancelled, everyone's getting sick.

-cough cough
-Nooooooooo!

title: The Oddvirus (feat. Team SoloMid) - This is HyperX Ep 2
